subject: Curlin (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Fen-Phen (Drug Combination)
lead_paragraph: A state judge ordered a sealed bid sale of a minority interest in Curlin, the 2007 Horse of the Year, to settle a $42 million judgment.
snippet: A state judge ordered a sealed bid sale of a minority interest in Curlin, the 2007 Horse of the Year, to settle a $42 million judgment.
